summary: An ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of buildings and premises, and rezoning certain property on the east side of 25th Avenue South, between Holgate Street and Grand Street; and on the east side of 5th Avenue Northeast at East 58th Street; amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith.
